verses.verse: And <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>,
No <S%H551>doubt<s%> but you are the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> shall die with <S%H4191>you<s%>.
<S%H1571>But<s%> I have <S%H3824>understanding<s%> as well as <S%H5307>you<s%>; I am not inferior to <S%H3644>you<s%>: Yes, who knows not such things as these?

I am as one <S%H7814>mocked<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, who <S%H7121>calls<s%> upon <S%H433>God<s%>, and he <S%H6030>answers<s%> <S%H6662>him<s%>: the just <S%H8549>upright<s%> man is laughed to <S%H7814>scorn<s%>.
He that is <S%H3559>ready<s%> to <S%H4571>slip<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet<s%> is as a <S%H3940>lamp<s%> <S%H937>despised<s%> in the <S%H6248>thought<s%> of him that is at <S%H7600>ease<s%>.

The <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of <S%H7703>robbers<s%> <S%H7951>prosper<s%>, and they that <S%H7264>provoke<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> are <S%H987>secure<s%>; into whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> brings <S%H935>abundantly<s%>.
<S%H199>But<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> now the <S%H929>animals<s%>, and they shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H5775>you<s%>; and the birds of the <S%H8064>air<s%>, and they shall tell <S%H5046>you<s%>:
Or <S%H7878>speak<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and it shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H1709>you<s%>: and the fish of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall declare unto <S%H5608>you<s%>.
Who <S%H3045>knows<s%> not in all these that the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has done <S%H6213>this<s%>?
In whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> is the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of every living <S%H2416>thing<s%>, and the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of all <S%H376>mankind<s%>.
Does not the <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H974>try<s%> <S%H4405>words<s%>? and the <S%H2441>mouth<s%> <S%H2938>taste<s%> his <S%H400>food<s%>?
With the <S%H3453>ancient<s%> is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; and in <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%>.
With him is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1369>strength<s%>, he has <S%H6098>counsel<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding<s%>.
<S%H2040>Behold<s%>, he breaks down, and it cannot be built <S%H1129>again<s%>: he shuts <S%H5462>up<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>, and there can be no <S%H6605>opening<s%>.
<S%H6113>Behold<s%>, he withholds the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and they dry <S%H3001>up<s%>: also he sends them <S%H7971>out<s%>, and they <S%H2015>overturn<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
With him is <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H8454>wisdom<s%>: the <S%H7683>deceived<s%> and the deceiver are <S%H7686>his<s%>.
He <S%H3212>leads<s%> <S%H3289>counselors<s%> away <S%H7758>spoiled<s%>, and makes the <S%H8199>judges<s%> <S%H1984>fools<s%>.
He <S%H6605>loosens<s%> the <S%H4148>bond<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%>, and <S%H631>yokes<s%> their <S%H4975>body<s%> with a <S%H232>belt<s%>.
He <S%H3212>leads<s%> <S%H3548>princes<s%> away <S%H7758>spoiled<s%>, and <S%H5557>overthrows<s%> the <S%H386>mighty<s%>.
He removes <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H8193>speech<s%> of the <S%H539>trusty<s%>, and takes <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H2940>understanding<s%> of the <S%H2205>aged<s%>.
He <S%H8210>pours<s%> <S%H937>contempt<s%> upon <S%H5081>princes<s%>, and <S%H7503>weakens<s%> the <S%H4206>strength<s%> of the <S%H650>mighty<s%>.
He <S%H1540>discovers<s%> deep <S%H6013>things<s%> out of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, and brings <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H216>light<s%> the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>.
He <S%H7679>increases<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H6>destroys<s%> <S%H7849>them<s%>: he enlarges the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and captures them <S%H5148>again<s%>.

He takes <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and causes them to <S%H8582>wander<s%> in a <S%H8414>wilderness<s%> where there is no <S%H1870>way<s%>.
They <S%H4959>grope<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark<s%> without <S%H216>light<s%>, and he makes them to <S%H8582>stagger<s%> like a drunken <S%H7910>man<s%>.
